mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, t1.`CONSUMED`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`date` AS `DATES`, t11.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`EVALUATIONCOST`, t1.`EVALUATIONDESC`, t1.`EVALUATIONSTATUS`, t1.`EVALUATIONTIME`, t1.`FILES`, t1.`ID`, t1.`INPUTCOST`, t1.`LEFT`, t1.`MONTHNAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t11.`PROJECT`, t21.`NAME` AS `PROJECTNAME`, t1.`TASK`, t1.`TASKESTIMATESN`, t11.`NAME` AS `TASKNAME`, t11.`TASKSPECIES`, t11.`TYPE`, t1.`UPDATEBY`, t1.`WORK` FROM `zt_taskestimate` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_task` t11 ON t1.`TASK` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_project` t21 ON t11.`PROJECT` = t21.`ID`

SELECT t1.`YEAR`, concat( t1.`YEAR`, RIGHT ( 100+ t1.`MONTH`, 2 ) ) AS `MONTH`, t1.`MONTH` as monthorder, concat( t1.`MONTH`, '月' ) AS monthname FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT YEAR ( t1.date ) AS `year`, MONTH ( t1.date ) AS `MONTH` FROM zt_taskestimate t1 WHERE t1.date <> '0000-00-00' ) t1
select t1.`YEAR`,concat(t1.`year`, '年') as yearname from (select DISTINCT year( t1.date ) AS `year` from zt_taskestimate t1 where t1.date <> '0000-00-00' ) t1

SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, t1.`CONSUMED`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`date` AS `DATES`, t11.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`EVALUATIONCOST`, t1.`EVALUATIONSTATUS`, t1.`EVALUATIONTIME`, t1.`FILES`, t1.`ID`, t1.`INPUTCOST`, t1.`LEFT`, t1.`MONTHNAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t11.`PROJECT`, t21.`NAME` AS `PROJECTNAME`, t1.`TASK`, t1.`TASKESTIMATESN`, t11.`NAME` AS `TASKNAME`, t11.`TASKSPECIES`, t11.`TYPE`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_taskestimate` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_task` t11 ON t1.`TASK` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_project` t21 ON t11.`PROJECT` = t21.`ID`

SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, t1.`CONSUMED`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`date` AS `DATES`, t11.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`EVALUATIONCOST`, t1.`EVALUATIONSTATUS`, t1.`EVALUATIONTIME`, t1.`FILES`, t1.`ID`, t1.`INPUTCOST`, t1.`LEFT`, t1.`MONTHNAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t11.`PROJECT`, t21.`NAME` AS `PROJECTNAME`, t1.`TASK`, t1.`TASKESTIMATESN`, t11.`NAME` AS `TASKNAME`, t11.`TASKSPECIES`, t11.`TYPE`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_taskestimate` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_task` t11 ON t1.`TASK` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_project` t21 ON t11.`PROJECT` = t21.`ID`
AND ( 1<>1 )

SELECT t1.`YEAR`, concat( t1.`YEAR`, RIGHT ( 100+ t1.`MONTH`, 2 ) ) AS `MONTH`, t1.`MONTH` as monthorder, concat( t1.`MONTH`, '月' ) AS monthname , t1.project FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT YEAR ( t1.date ) AS `year`, MONTH ( t1.date ) AS `MONTH` , t.project FROM zt_taskestimate t1 left join zt_task t on t.TASKSN = t1.task WHERE t1.date <> '0000-00-00' ) t1
AND t1.project =#{srf.webcontext.project}

SELECT t1.`YEAR`, concat( t1.`year`, '年' ) AS yearname , t1.project FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT YEAR ( t1.date ) AS `year`,t.project FROM zt_taskestimate t1 left join zt_task t on t.TASKSN = t1.task WHERE t1.date <> '0000-00-00' ) t1
AND t1.project =#{srf.webcontext.project}

SELECT t1.`ACCOUNT`, t1.`CONSUMED`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`date` AS `DATES`, t11.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`EVALUATIONCOST`, t1.`EVALUATIONSTATUS`, t1.`EVALUATIONTIME`, t1.`FILES`, t1.`ID`, t1.`INPUTCOST`, t1.`LEFT`, t1.`MONTHNAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t11.`PROJECT`, t21.`NAME` AS `PROJECTNAME`, t1.`TASK`, t1.`TASKESTIMATESN`, t11.`NAME` AS `TASKNAME`, t11.`TASKSPECIES`, t11.`TYPE`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_taskestimate` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_task` t11 ON t1.`TASK` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_project` t21 ON t11.`PROJECT` = t21.`ID`
AND ( t11.`PROJECT` = #{srf.webcontext.project} AND t11.`DELETED` = '0' )
